text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump I’d like to know how you think you can falsely claim that you inherited faulty Coronavirus tests when the virus isn’t a year old &, these tests were just recently developed under your administration? You’re a liar, a con, and really stupid thinking people wouldn’t figure it out.
